colour: This hat is appropriate to wear during the day. With your friends at the beach. At the mall. With your cat. Or your favourite pair of shoes.
This style is great when you're going to the bar or being hooligans with your hipster friends. The dark colours help you blend in with the night.
This hat is great for playing dress up with your little cousins. Dancing around to Taylor Swift. And pretending that you are an animal. Fierce.

comments.comment: I love this hat. Bought it for my cat.
